analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, diṭṭhigatehi pariyuṭṭhitā devamanussā olīyanti eke, atidhāvanti eke; cakkhumanto ca passanti.
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave diṭṭhi gatehi pariyuṭṭhitāḥ deva manussāḥ olīyanti eke atidhāvanti eke cakkhumanto ca passanti

original: Bhavārāmā, bhikkhave, devamanussā bhavaratā bhavasammuditā tesaṁ bhavanirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittaṁ na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
analyzed: bhava ārāmāḥ bhikkhave deva manussāḥ bhava ratāḥ bhava sammuditā tesam bhava nirodhāya dhamme desiyamāne cittam na pakkhandati na pasīdati na santiṭṭhati na adhimuccati

original: Bhaveneva kho paneke aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā vibhavaṁ abhinandanti—
analyzed: bhavena iva khalu paneke aṭṭīyamānāḥ harāyamānāḥ jigucchamānāḥ vibhavam abhinandanti

original: yato kira, bho, ayaṁ attā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti paraṁ maraṇā;
analyzed: yatas kira bho ayam attā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā ucchijjati vinassati na hoti param maraṇā

original: etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ etaṁ yāthāvanti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam etam yāthāvanti

original: bhūtaṁ bhūtato disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
analyzed: bhūtam bhūtataḥ disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipannaḥ hoti
evam kho bhikkhave cakkhumanto passanti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
